name: Thousand Kisses of Death
description:
Thousand Kisses of Death is a first-person arcade platformer.

You collect orbs on a fragile platform while being subject to the constant rage and fire of a giant floating head.

Made in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40.

If you enjoyed the music, you can find more on my Soundcloud profile: https://soundcloud.com/secretstage
